reviewText: I am genuinely enjoying the brief series.  As a devoted Whately fan, I am predisposed to enjoy just about anything he appears in.  As regards the series, it's not quite up to the high standards of "Morse" or "Lewis".  The character development is good, perhaps a bit too 'sweet' for hardcore mystery/detective aficionado.  Yet, if you are a die-hard Kevin Whately fan (enough to enjoy the "Auf wiedersehen pet" series, you'll enjoy Whately youthful and spirited look combined with a wee bit of shy and bashful.
